snippet.title: Amber Heard's Side (AUDIO 2) Johnny Depp Domestic Violence - Fearing for Life, Evidence, Escalations
snippet.description:
Amber Heard's Side of Audio Leak 2 of Domestic Violence & Johnny Depp. She feared for her life, there were escalating fights, and she refers to multiple acts of violence. #NotABystander to domestic abuse. SIGN TO SUPPORT HER: https://www.change.org/p/amber-heard-supporters-we-support-amber-heard-in-aquaman-2

Previous interpretations only show JD's side, but half of the 30 minute audio strongly supports Amber. We've ordered it with importance and explanations of her side of the story.
#StopDomesticViolence

HER SIDE:
- She feared for her life and that JD would 'accidentally' kill her.
- She believes JD is an abuser. She refers to abuse & violence in December, May, and April. 
- IO Tillett called 911 because of escalating violence and she feared physical harm and needed to protect herself.
- Bodyguards told her off record that she would be killed, and one is recorded on a phone witnessing violence.
- Travis (guard) had to pull JD away from Amber. (JD admits this)
- She has collaborating photos and text messages to her mother, family, and friends as proof.
- She missed work because of fear of bruising and injuries the next day, and texted Jodi
(Amber Heard is crying, intimidated, and stressed - in the audio and life)
- She is defending herself and says it makes JD angry that she defends herself. He is attacking her with abuse even on the phone call.
- She has documented evidence, and eyewitness statements over the years of abuse who would provide statements under oath.
- She has collaborating texts, photos, and statements with time stamps and matching dates of abuse.
- Texts between people, people overhearing their fights, people seeing it the next day of abuse, or responding to the abuse.
- She says JD doesn't believe her (crying) and it's pointless, but she's telling the truth with the timeline matching.
- She was told she had a strong case of domestic violence, and if she filed against JD, they would prosecute him. She said she wanted to protect him and waited for the RO.
- She says she doesn't want to hurt him.
- She says JD used TMZ, tabloid media, to smear her credibility. She was *forced* to respond and defend herself.
- TMZ was creating lies while she was in LA Court about there not being two sets of police officers at the penthouses. They subpoenaed the the security records as proof.
- She cannot overpower him, and there's a large physical difference between them. He claims she 'started' the fights. She has photos, audio, and texts* of abuse. No fair fights in strength or ability. 
- She, her family, and her friends have received death threats - which is not safety.
- JD gets angry about Amber Heard saying he is sending info to the tabloid media and raises his voice, saying she didn't 'make nice nice' and will see her in court.
- JD tells Amber she 'doesn't exist to him.' Amber Heard says he doesn't need to be cruel on top of it. 
- JD says going to court will harm both of them and is telling Amber Heard to use the NDA and written letter to settle.
- JD is telling her to not go to court.
- JD tells Amber he knows she wants to defend herself and respond.
- JD acknowledges fights between Amber and him in the past, it's already known and out there, and mentions the NDA & letter.
- She says her credibility was dishonestly smeared. JD says the abuse needs to be dealt with (NDA).
- JD blames Amber for being *forced* to defend, protect herself, and to respond and for the smearing of her in the tabloid media and online.
- Amber Heard did not want any of this to happen and to be forced to defend herself, but JD won't believe her. She has the timeline (crying).
- She says she only has her integrity...

-- Believe Abuse Against Women Early, Interfere, and Support Their Leaving -- 

#AmberHeard has a long-term leadership, humanitarian, positive background with credibility: 

She was the first American actress to be named Human Rights Champion to the United Nations. She's an ambassador for the ACLU, donor to Women's Rights Groups, protector of refugees, and does charity. She has spent years helping children.
 
- Supporter of Born This Way Foundation, GLAAD, Habitat for Humanity, The Trevor Project, RiseNowUS, Sam's USA, Cyber Civil Rights Initiative, SHIELD Act, Center for Inquiry, World Identity Network, and Human Rights Campaign.

- Spoke at global events like the UN Social Good Summit, Global Citizen Festival, One Young World Conference, L'Oreal Women of Worth, and Emery Awards Gala.

She's #Mera in the movie Aquaman.

We created this video & petition because we would prevent & stop abuse against women...

Don't be a bystander or go with crowds - dig & look into the story, stand up for underdogs, & understand the situational stress involved and social status dynamics. 

- See Something, DO something... #SaveLives

#DomesticViolence #DomesticAbuse #JohnnyDepp #EndVAW #UnitedNations #ACLU #HeForShe #HumanRights #Aquaman #ChangeTheWorld #WomensRights #Heroes #Superheroes #GenderEquality #Leadership #WomenInTech
